Method Detail

isSpeedBackward

boolean isSpeedBackward()
Gets a value that indicates whether the contains speed value is meant for backward (true) or forward (false) direction.

Returns:
True for backward or false for forward speed direction.

getSpeed

int getSpeed()
Gets the speed the ai has set.

Returns:
The speed as int.

getDirection

int getDirection()
Gets the angle for the oar.

Returns:
The angle for the oar in degrees.
